channel.title: Can someone EXPLAIN why my server isn't WORKING!
channel.description:
recently i've discovered a problem, yesterday my server was working fine, and today, it just decides to go on a break wdf?...?
i can get on it but non of my mates can, the following programmes are the ones i use to run my server,
no-ip...himachi.... runserver.....compiler.....moparscape,
and thats how i usually run it yah? and today it decides not to let anyone else on... if this is the problem please say now! ---- ( if the ports aren't open? )...
im on a wireless router? so how do i change them to open? XD?!!!!!!!!!! :D :(

item.title: Can someone EXPLAIN why my server isn't WORKING!

item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

yeah, but it was working yesterday with both on…

item.title: Can someone EXPLAIN why my server isn't WORKING!
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

You don’t use no-ip & Hamachi. Pick one.

If you choose no-ip you need to Port Forward if you have a router. If you use Hamachi they need your Hamachi ip.

To run it do this:

Compile
Run server
Load hamachi
Give out Hamachi ip & port
Have people connect.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone EXPLAIN why my server isn't WORKING!
